narrative:
This was a focused inspection to address the health of the adult male giraffe. No non-compliant items identified
during this inspection.
 
The inspection was conducted on 25 March 2014 with facility representatives. A telephone exit interview was
conducted with the Zoo Director on 2 April 2014.
Additional Inspectors
Cole Heather, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
Clarke Lynn, Animal Care Inspector
